product_name: Kiss My Face Cool Sport Sunscreen Spray - SPF 50 - 6 fl. oz.
long_description: Now in a convenient Air Powered Spray(TM), the Kiss My Face Cool Sport SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray combines chamomile, vitamin C and vitamin E with aloe and cucumber body coolers to hydrate your skin. Provides broad spectrum SPF 50 protection and is sweat resistant for 40 min. Sunscreen is biodegradable, paraben free, phthalate free, vegan friendly and free of artificial flavors and fragrances. Made with gluten-free ingredients. 1-touch, any-angle spray is great for hard-to-reach areas. Kiss My Face Cool Sport SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray has a natural coconut fragrance.
short_description: Now in a convenient Air Powered Spray(TM), the Kiss My Face Cool Sport SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray combines chamomile, vitamin C and vitamin E with aloe and cucumber body coolers to hydrate your skin.
